Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Annotation Types
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Annotation Types 
    Annotation Type and Description
    org.jcrom.annotations.JcrUUID
    As of JCR 2.0, JcrIdentifier should be used instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.findAll(String, String, int)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.findAll(String, NodeFilter) instead.

    Find all entities represented by this DAO.
    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.findAll(String, String, int)
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.findAll(String, String, int, long, long)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.findAll(String, NodeFilter, long, long) instead.

    Find all entities represented by this DAO. Takes parameters that control the size and offset of the result, and filter which child nodes to load.

    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.findAll(String, String, int, long, long)
    org.jcrom.Jcrom.fromNode(Class<T>, Node, String, int)
    This method is now deprecated. Use Jcrom.fromNode(Class, Node, NodeFilter) instead.

    Maps the node supplied to an instance of the entity class.
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.get(String, String, int)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.get(String, NodeFilter) instead.

    Get an entity from JCR by path (from a @JcrPath field).
    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.get(String, String, int)
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.getAll(String, String, int)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.getAll(String, NodeFilter) instead.

    Get all entities from JCR by path (from a @JcrPath field).
    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.getAll(String, String, int)
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.getAll(String, String, int, long, long)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.getAll(String, NodeFilter, long, long) instead.

    Get all entities from JCR by path (from a @JcrPath field). Takes parameters that control the size and offset of the result, and filter which child nodes to load.

    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.getAll(String, String, int, long, long)
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.getVersion(String, String, String, int)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.getVersion(String, String, NodeFilter) instead.
    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.getVersion(String, String, String, int)
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.getVersionById(String, String, String, int)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.getVersionById(String, String, NodeFilter) instead.
    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.getVersionById(String, String, String, int)
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.getVersionByUUID(String, String)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.getVersionById(String, String) instead.
    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.getVersionByUUID(String, String)
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.getVersionByUUID(String, String, String, int)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.getVersionById(String, String, NodeFilter) instead.
    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.getVersionByUUID(String, String, String, int)
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.getVersionList(String, String, int)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.getVersionList(String, NodeFilter) instead.
    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.getVersionList(String, String, int)
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.getVersionList(String, String, int, long, long)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.getVersionList(String, NodeFilter, long, long) instead.
    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.getVersionList(String, String, int, long, long)
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.getVersionListById(String, String, int)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.getVersionListById(String, NodeFilter) instead.
    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.getVersionListById(String, String, int)
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.getVersionListById(String, String, int, long, long)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.getVersionListById(String, NodeFilter, long, long) instead.
    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.getVersionListById(String, String, int, long, long)
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.getVersionListByUUID(String)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.getVersionListById(String) instead.
    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.getVersionListByUUID(String)
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.getVersionListByUUID(String, String, int)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.getVersionListById(String, NodeFilter) instead.
    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.getVersionListByUUID(String, String, int)
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.getVersionListByUUID(String, String, int, long, long)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.getVersionListById(String, NodeFilter, long, long) instead.
    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.getVersionListByUUID(String, String, int, long, long)
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.getVersionSizeByUUID(String)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.getVersionSizeById(String) instead.
    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.getVersionSizeByUUID(String)
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.loadById(String, String, int)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.loadById(String, NodeFilter) instead.

    Load an entity from JCR by UUID lookup.
    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.loadById(String, String, int)
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.loadByUUID(String)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.loadById(String) instead.

    Load an entity from JCR by UUID lookup.
    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.loadByUUID(String)
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.loadByUUID(String, String, int)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.loadById(String, NodeFilter) instead.

    Load an entity from JCR by UUID lookup.
    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.loadByUUID(String, String, int)
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.removeByUUID(String)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.removeById(String) instead.

    Permanently remove the entity with the UUID supplied.
    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.removeByUUID(String)
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.removeVersionByUUID(String, String)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.removeVersionById(String, String) instead.
    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.removeVersionByUUID(String, String)
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.restoreVersionByUUID(String, String)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.restoreVersionById(String, String) instead.
    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.restoreVersionByUUID(String, String)
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.restoreVersionByUUID(String, String, boolean)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.restoreVersionById(String, String, boolean) instead.
    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.restoreVersionByUUID(String, String, boolean)
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.update(T, String, int)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.update(Object, NodeFilter) instead.

    Updates an existing JCR Node with the values extracted from the object supplied.
    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.update(T, String, int)
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.updateById(T, String, String, int)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.updateById(Object, String, NodeFilter) instead.

    Updates an existing JCR Node with the values extracted from the object supplied. The node to update is loaded using the Identifier supplied.

    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.updateById(T, String, String, int)
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.updateByUUID(T, String)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.updateById(Object, String) instead.

    Updates an existing JCR Node with the values extracted from the object supplied. The node to update is loaded using the UUID supplied.

    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.updateByUUID(T, String)
    org.jcrom.dao.JcrDAO.updateByUUID(T, String, String, int)
    This method is now deprecated. Use JcrDAO.updateById(Object, String, NodeFilter) instead.

    Updates an existing JCR Node with the values extracted from the object supplied. The node to update is loaded using the UUID supplied.

    org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO.updateByUUID(T, String, String, int)
    org.jcrom.Jcrom.updateNode(Node, Object, String, int)
    This method is now deprecated. Use Jcrom.updateNode(Node, Object, NodeFilter) instead.

    Update an existing JCR node with the entity supplied.
